mapper.sql: SELECT id, name, delivery_type deliveryType, signature_menu_id signatureMenuId, tel, address_code addressCode, address_detail addressDetail, biz_number bizNumber, info, min_order_price minOrderPrice, notice, operating_time operatingTime, owner_id ownerId, created_at createdAt, updated_at updatedAt, status, order_type orderType, origin_info originInfo, work_condition workCondition FROM SHOP
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHOP( name, delivery_type, signature_menu_id, tel, address_code, address_detail, biz_number, info, min_order_price, notice, operating_time, owner_id, order_type, origin_info ) VALUES( #{name}, #{deliveryType}, #{signatureMenuId}, #{tel}, #{addressCode}, #{addressDetail}, #{bizNumber}, #{info}, #{minOrderPrice}, #{notice}, #{operatingTime}, #{ownerId}, #{orderType}, #{originInfo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SHOP SET status = 'DELETED', updatedAt = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE SHOP SET tel = #{tel}, delivery_type = #{deliveryType}, operating_time = #{operatingTime}, info = #{info}, origin_info = #{originInfo}, notice = #{notice}, min_order_price = #{minOrderPrice}, order_type = #{orderType}, updated_at = NOW()
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SHOP WHERE id = #{shopId} AND work_condition != 'OPEN'

SELECT A.id, A.name, A.delivery_type deliveryType, A.signature_menu_id signatureMenuId, A.info, A.order_type orderType FROM SHOP A JOIN DELIVERY_LOCATION B ON A.id = B.shop_id WHERE A.status != 'DELETE' AND B.town_code = #{townCode} ORDER BY work_condition DESC
